name: Spot the Difference Image Hunt Puzzle Game - Paradise Edition
name_original: Spot the Difference Image Hunt Puzzle Game - Paradise Edition
description: Play Paradise Spot the Difference! Look at two images side-by-side and find five differences before time runs out. Choose from several amazing categories including: Underwater Reef - Bikini - Jungle - Resort - Tropical. This game has over 100 amazing images for you to enjoy. Log into Game Center to compete with other people and see who has the highest score!
